GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.10 by commit 62b5d188a270a25138a88c18409c596c1406b993. For more details please see the references link.
